'''NPC Dialogue Rewards''' ''(unofficial name)'' are items given to the player by following a certain dialogue route when talking to an [[NPC]]. In some cases, the correct dialogue option may be locked behind completing a [[Quest]]. In a [[Yvette|special case]], completing a Quest may lock the player out of the reward.

NPC dialogue rewards are referred to as "Resident Conversation Gifts" when viewing the source of [[Furnishing]]s.

==Unique Rewards==
There are only some NPCs which give unique dialogue rewards that are not obtainable anywhere else. These include:
* [[Artifact]]s:
** {{Item|Scholar's Clock}} 2★ - [[Timaeus]]
** {{Item|Berserker's Indigo Feather}} 2★ - [[Carpe Diem]]
* [[Quest Item]]s:
** {{Item|Nameless Sketch}} - [[Vermeer]]
** {{Item|Teyvat Wilderness Survivalist's Recipes}} - [[Lynn]]
* [[Furnishing]]s:
** {{Item|A Mask}} - [[Inagi Hotomi]]
** {{Item|Singing Majalis}} - [[Arakavi]]
** {{Item|Taste of Warmth}} - [[Arapacati]]
* [[Book]]s:
** {{Item|Ballads of the Squire}} Vol. 1 - [[Ellin]]
** {{Item|Breeze Amidst the Forest}} Vol. 1 - [[Six-Fingered José]]
** {{Item|Customs of Liyue}} Vol. 1 - [[Soraya]]
** {{Item|Legend of the Shattered Halberd}} Vol. 3 - [[Tea Master Liu Su]]
** {{Item|Records of Jueyun}} Vol. 1 - [[Jifang]]
** {{Item|Records of Jueyun}} Vol. 2 - [[Wuyuan]]
** {{Item|Records of the Gallant}} Vol. 1 - [[Little Liu]]
** {{Item|The Boar Princess}} Vol. 7 - [[Marla]]
** {{Item|The Fox in the Dandelion Sea}} Vol. 1 - [[Flora]]
** {{Item|The Legend of Vennessa}} Vol. 1 - [[Dr. Edith]]
** {{Item|The Legend of Vennessa}} Vol. 2 - [[Sayid]]
** {{Item|The Mondstadt Tower}} Vol. 1 - [[Patchi the Curious]]
** {{Item|Vera's Melancholy}} Vol. 1 - [[Tia]]
